snippet.title: Path of Giants - Mobile Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Path of Giants by Journey Bound is coming August 27th 2019 to 
Apple's App Store - https://apps.apple.com/us/app/path-of-giants/id1475781647
Google Play Store - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.JourneyBoundGames.PathofGaints

Take control of three explorers in this serene mobile puzzle game as they help each other conquer puzzles, delving further into a mountain of trials in search of a lost treasure.

For the latest updates follow us on:
Instagram - http://instagram.com/journeyboundgames
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/journeyboundgames
Twitter - https://twitter.com/journey_bound

Music by Clark Aboud

https://www.pathofgiants.com/
